title: Spicy miso squid with crunchy garlic toasts

ingredients.item: 1 tsp Miso Tasty Organic Aka Red Miso Paste
1 clove garlic roughly chopped, plus 2 cloves crushed
500g raw squid tubes, cleaned and sliced into rings
1 Waitrose Sourdough With Mixed Seeds Demi Baguette, cut into thin diagonal slices

instructions.step: Preheat the grill to its highest setting. Bring 500ml water to the boil in a saucepan with the tomato purée, miso paste, chopped garlic and red chillies. Reduce the heat, add the squid and cook very gently for 3-5 minutes until cooked and tender.

Meanwhile, mix together the butter and crushed garlic, and spread onto the baguette slices. Grill for 2-3 minutes, until toasted. Divide the squid and miso broth between 2 large bowls. Garnish with the salad onions and serve with the garlic toasts.
